humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the tumor classification is pT2(mult)NOLOVORX, which means that there is no evidence of lymph node metastasis (N0) based on the rules provided. This is further supported by the fact that there is no mention of positive lymph nodes or metastases in the report.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report only mentions the tumor size (pT2) and the absence of lymph node involvement (NO) in the tumor classification. There is no mention of any regional lymph node metastasis. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.
